summary: The diff implements most of the requested functionality for donor sorting logic and Call Count column addition. The AppointedDonorsList.tsx correctly implements reversed sorting with nulls first and secondary call count sorting. The DonorTable.tsx implements alphabetical name sorting with secondary blood group sorting and adds a 'Calls' column. React Query invalidation is present in useQueries.ts. However, the diff is truncated, preventing full verification of the Call Count column implementation and complete UI rendering details.
